titles.title: CB 173 Where Shall I Go From Thy Spirit?
Psalm 139

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
WHERE SHALL I GO FROM THY SPIRIT?
Where shall I flee from Thy presence?
If I ascend into heaven, Thou art there,
If I go down to the depths, Thou art there.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
If I take the wings of the morning
And fly to the farthest sea,
There will Thy hand still lead me
Thy right hand still holds me safe.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Surely the night will cover
And the light all around be as night.
But yet the dark hideth not from Thee,
For the night is as bright as the day.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord, Thou hast searched me and known me;
You know my thoughts from afar.
You trace my path as I walk, when I rest,
Before, behind, You are there with Your hand.
